user.title: Solar Forecast ML - Setup
user.description: Configure your Solar Forecast ML integration. All settings can be changed later.

data_description.power_entity: Sensor with daily solar yield in kWh (e.g., sensor.solar_yield_today)
data_description.plant_kwp: Your solar system's peak power (e.g., 2.13 for 2.13 kWp)
data_description.update_interval: How often to update predictions (default: 3600 seconds = 1 hour)
data_description.forecast_solar_sensor: Forecast.Solar integration sensor for comparison (unit: kWh)
data_description.current_power_sensor: Current solar power in W for hourly profile learning (e.g., sensor.inverter_power)
data_description.lux_sensor: Brightness sensor in Lux or W/m² (e.g., sensor.outdoor_lux)
data_description.wind_sensor: Wind speed sensor in km/h or m/s (e.g., sensor.wind_speed)
data_description.uv_sensor: UV index sensor (0-11 scale, e.g., sensor.uv_index)
data_description.inverter_power_sensor: Inverter current power in W to detect offline status
data_description.inverter_daily_yield: Inverter daily yield in kWh to verify operation

reconfigure.title: Reconfigure Solar Forecast ML
reconfigure.description: Change sensors and settings. The integration will reload automatically.

data_description.power_entity: Sensor with daily solar yield in kWh
data_description.plant_kwp: Your solar system's peak power (e.g., 2.13 for 2.13 kWp)
data_description.update_interval: How often to update predictions (default: 3600 seconds)
data_description.current_power_sensor: Current solar power in W for hourly learning
data_description.lux_sensor: Brightness sensor in Lux or W/m²
data_description.wind_sensor: Wind speed sensor in km/h or m/s

data_description.enable_diagnostic: Shows integration status and last update time
data_description.enable_hourly: Creates sensor for next hour solar production forecast
data_description.notify_forecast: Sends daily forecast notification at 6:00 AM
data_description.notify_learning: Shows learning results after midnight analysis
